metadata.title: Master's Insight AI | AI Four Pillars of Destiny Analysis
metadata.description: Eastern fortune-telling wisdom meets cutting-edge AI to analyze your destiny.

landing.headline:
A 30-Year Master of Destiny
Put Down His Brush After Seeing Gemini AI
landing.subheadline:
An AI trained on the finest classics from Korea, China, and Japan
delivers sharper insights than human experts.
landing.cta: Experience the overwhelming quality that amazed a 30-year expert

trust.gungtonggobogam: Integrated with Qiong Tong Bao Jian

step1.title: Story
step1.headline:
A 30-Year Master of Destiny
Became Humble Before AI
step1.quote: This AI has surpassed my 30 years of interpretive skill. I never imagined it could integrate the depth of Ziping Zhenchuan with the seasonal theory of Qiong Tong Bao Jian so precisely.

step2.title: Birth Information
step2.headline: Enter Your Birth Information
step2.subheadline: Please provide accurate birth details for precise analysis

form.birthTimeHint: Leave blank if you don't know the time
form.timezoneHint: Select the timezone of your birth country

step3.title: Value Proposition
step3.headline: One Analysis, Lifetime Record
step3.subheadline: Your destiny stays with you forever

lifetimeRecord.title: Lifetime Storage
lifetimeRecord.description: Today's analysis is stored forever in My Page

continuity.title: Continuous Consultation
continuity.description: Custom analysis for life events: new year, moving, career changes

yearlyRecommendation.title: Yearly Recommendations
yearlyRecommendation.description: Optimal timing suggestions based on luck cycles

step3.ctaHint: Choose your focus area in the next step

focus.title: Select Focus Area
focus.headline: What area would you like to focus on?
focus.subheadline: We'll provide deeper insights for your chosen area
focus.overallNote: Includes lifetime fortune, personality, wealth, love, health, and 10-year luck cycle

question.title: Your Concerns
question.headline: Do you have specific concerns?
question.subheadline: AI will provide customized analysis for your concerns
question.placeholder: e.g., Is it a good time to change jobs this year?

focusAreaDescription.wealth: In-depth analysis of wealth and business fortune
focusAreaDescription.love: Analysis of love and relationship fortune
focusAreaDescription.career: Analysis of career and promotion fortune

wealth: When is the best time to buy real estate this year?
Should I expand my current business?
When is the right time for stock investment?
love: What's my compatibility with my current partner?
Is it okay to get married this year?
When will I meet my destined partner?
career: Is it a good time to change jobs this year?
When is the best time to start a business?
health: Are there times I should be careful about my health?
Which aspects of health should I watch?
Any recommendations for exercise or diet?
overall: What should I focus on most this year?
What should I watch for in my luck cycle?
When is the best period of my life?

payment.title: Payment
payment.subtitle: Recharge credits to start your analysis

mypage.title: My Page
mypage.subtitle: Manage your analysis history and account settings

analysisHistory.title: Analysis History
analysisHistory.subtitle: View your past destiny analysis results

questionHistory.title: Question History
questionHistory.subtitle: View your follow-up questions and AI answers
questionHistory.emptyDescription: Ask follow-up questions on your analysis result page

notificationSettings.title: Notification Settings
notificationSettings.subtitle: Manage email notifications and reminders
notificationSettings.emailNotificationsDescription: Receive service updates and event news via email
notificationSettings.yearlyReminderDescription: Get notified for new year fortune analysis every year
notificationSettings.infoDescription: You can unsubscribe from email notifications anytime. Important service announcements may still be sent regardless of settings.

profileSettings.title: Profile Settings
profileSettings.subtitle: Manage your account information
profileSettings.name: Name
profileSettings.nameHint: Name is only displayed on My Page
profileSettings.languageHint: Applied to analysis results and AI responses
profileSettings.dangerZoneDescription: Account deletion is irreversible and all data will be permanently deleted.

processing.subtitle: Calculating 12 months of fortune and lucky days...

result.monthlyTimelineDesc: View 12-month fortune changes at a glance
